definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: A number of investigators have used the fluorescent-antibody (FA) technique for Salmonella detection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙门氏菌检测的荧光抗体技术为能被广范应用。

sentences.english: A simple hierarchical coarse-to-fine edge detection method based on the direction of potential edge elements is given.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于边界点方向的新的边界检测方法。

sentences.english: The company has advanced technology equipment and pipe sound detection equipment.
sentences.chinese: 公司拥有先进的制管工艺设备和完善的检测设备。

sentences.english: Check if this machine has a public IP address.
sentences.chinese: 检测这台机器是否有一个公网IP地址。

sentences.english: With the development of detective methods, the concept of transdifferentiation is being accepted by people.
sentences.chinese: 随着检测手段的进步，转分化正逐渐被人们认同。

sentences.english: ASAS/Tysol, Inc. has a complete line of products focused on leak detection.
sentences.chinese: 股份有限公司，在渗漏检测方面有一套完善的生产线。

sentences.english: The signals create images of your heart that can help your doctor determine the cause of your heart arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 通过检测信号就可以对心脏成像并帮助医生推测病因。

sentences.english: This article introduces the Data Collecting System in the Multi-function Car for Test and Inspection of Vehicles in Specific Sites and Area.
sentences.chinese: 介绍厂内机动车辆综合检测车的数据检测采集系统。

sentences.english: This article introduces the Data Collecting System in the Multi-function Car for Test and Inspection of Vehicles in Specific Sites and Area.
sentences.chinese: 介绍厂内机动车辆综合检测车的数据检测采集系统。

sentences.english: No laboratory analysis service for saxitoxin test in humans is currently available in Macao.
sentences.chinese: 本澳目前并无对人体中石房蛤毒素含量的实验室检测。

sentences.english: The changes of water sodium metabolism and the PGE2 were detected.
sentences.chinese: 检测两组水钠代谢和尿前列腺素PGE2的变化。

sentences.english: Anti-Xa activity is an acceptable alternate method to monitor heparin therapy.
sentences.chinese: 抗X因子活性是可接受的检测肝素治疗的替代方法。

sentences.english: Finally, prospects of future development of seepage detection technology are presented.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对渗漏检测技术的发展前景作了展望。

sentences.english: If you are overweight or obese, your doctor should test you periodically for a pre-diabetic condition called glucose intolerance.
sentences.chinese: 如果你超重或肥胖，你的医生会检测你得糖耐量。

sentences.english: A novel UV-vis detector for high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种新型的高效液相色谱紫外可见检测器。

sentences.english: This paper proposes a recursive forecast method for elevator traffic flow based on outlier detection.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于异常值检测的电梯交通流递归预测方法。

definition: to act with self-restraint/to examine oneself/to perform a self-test
